scripts.lint: npm --prefix hillside-app run lint && npm --prefix hillside-next run lint && cd hillside-api && ruff check app tests
scripts.typecheck: npm --workspace hillside-app exec tsc -b --pretty false && npm --workspace hillside-next run typecheck && npm --workspace @hillside/shared run typecheck
scripts.test: npm --prefix hillside-app run test -- --run --passWithNoTests && python -m pytest hillside-api/tests -q && npm --prefix hillside-contracts run test
